display_long_description:
Beyondreal virtual offices - a collaboration space for teams in stunning locations.

- whiteboarding as an entire location, 
- photorealistic full-body avatars with face recognition: be yourself,  just  upload your picture,
- increase your productivity: use multiple screens, 3D tools, stickers, 
- create smart maps, show products and enrich your workflow,
- use your VR headset or invite others via standard video streaming tools,
- record and stream from multiple cameras,
- work in impressive and exciting locations and have engaging and productive meetings,
- make the space your own: brand and save your meeting space and reuse it at anytime,
- connect  to your team and plan activities: play basketball, chess, chat next to the fireplace or even visit an art exhibition…

Build greater things and have a better communication in Beyondreal virtual offices, which do not just give you a place to work, but immerse you in a engaging workflow.
